name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SCREEN RECORDER - MY SPACE. Capture Screen & Camera. Share via GOOGLE DRIVE

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture your entire computer screen, application windows, or Chrome tabs effortlessly with our all-in-one screen recording Chrome…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Capture your entire computer screen, application windows, or Chrome tabs effortlessly with our all-in-one screen recording Chrome extension. Seamlessly embed your webcam video and audio into recordings for a personalized touch, all without the need for any additional software installation.

Key Features:

	•	Versatile Recording Options: Record your entire desktop, specific application windows, or Chrome tabs. Add your webcam video and audio directly into the recording, giving you a complete and engaging output every time.
	•	Easy Storage and Sharing: Save your recordings directly to your own Google Drive account, ensuring you maintain full control and organization of your files without creating new accounts or worrying about data privacy. All recordings are saved in a dedicated folder, keeping your Drive tidy.
	•	Instant Preview and Downloads: View recordings instantly within the app or download them to your device. Easily share recordings directly from Google Drive with just one click.
	•	No Additional Installations Required: Enjoy a unique, first-of-its-kind experience where you can capture your webcam and audio alongside your screen recording—exclusively on your browser without needing any external application.

Upgrade your screen recording experience with simplicity, efficiency, and full control over your content. Download now and start creating professional-quality recordings in seconds!

Let me know if you’d like any changes or additions at haridoss123@gmail.com
